label: 督
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: The senior officer (junior fifth rank, upper grade) in charge of the Left (Sama no Kami)  or Right (Uma no Kami) Imperial Stables (Meryō, Uma no Tsukasa).  The incumbent held the junior fifth rank, upper grade.  In “Hahakigi,” also Chief Left Equerry.[左馬督、右馬督、馬寮、箒木][also別当][RK]
